mapper.insert: insert into sms_task (id,template_id,template_name,template_code,service_type,sms_content, receivers, variables, status,remarks,create_by,create_time,biz_id, add_all) values (#{id},#{templateId},#{templateName},#{templateCode},#{serviceType},#{smsContent},#{receivers},#{variables},#{status},#{remarks},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{bizId}, #{addAll})
mapper.update: update sms_task set biz_id=#{bizId}, update_by=#{updateBy}, update_time=#{updateTime} where id=#{id}
